description: A crack shot with arcane bullets.

type: Demon-possessed swordsman with magical prowess

description: Becomes living flame to scorch foes.

name: Kenshin

name: Tana Phoenix
type: Fire user summon flames from the palms of her hands and other body parts

name: Paul Watoski

description: Demolition prodigy with arcane charges.

name: Lyra
type: Uses magic spells and healing spells
description: Soothing mage whose light mends all.

type: Boxer with incredible strength and reflexes. Superhuman strength

description: Serene monk who channels inner chi.

name: Sora Lorashu

description: A duelist weaving elemental currents.
